author: T.C. Sottek
title: The coronavirus is now the American virus
description: The United States now has over 80,000 infections and more than 1,000 deaths, marking a grim milestone and emphasizing Trump’s failure to act.
content:
As deaths and infections mount, our historic failure to stop the outbreak will become a dark lesson
Photo by Tasos Katopodis/Getty Images
The United States now has the highest number of coronavirus infections of any nation on the planet, The New York Times … [+1948 chars]
